name: Hermione: My Love Online Quiz | Harry Potter - Characters | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which class does Hermione run out of in "The Goblet of Fire"?
questions.explanation:
Potions.

	She runs away after Snape says that he doesn't see a difference between the fangs Malfoy gave her and her original teeth. She is extremely offended and she runs from the class, in tears.

questions.text: Who of the following portrays Hermione in the Harry Potter movies?
questions.explanation:
Emma Watson.

	Emma Watson is also one of my favorite actresses. Pansy Parkinson is just a character in the Harry Potter stories. Dame Maggie Smith potrays Professor McGonagall, the transfiguration teacher. Kirsten Dunst has absolutely nothing to do with "Harry Potter".

questions.text: What did someone send Hermione as a nasty present in Book 4, because of Rita Skeeter's article about her toying with Harry Potter's emotions?
questions.explanation:
pus.

	An angry newspaper reader sends Hermione the pus, and she opens it. She then realizes that it is undiluted. Her hands erupt in boils, and she has to go to the hospital wing. Thanks to little_miss_kaina for bringing this to my attention.

questions.text: Which of the following does Hermione use to identify Professor Lupin as a werewolf in year 3?
questions.correct: the boggart turned into a full moon when he faced it
questions.explanation:
the boggart turned into a full moon when he faced it.

	Hermione, who is extremely clever, notices that Lupin was always absent on the full moon. She also realizes that the Boggart turned into the moon when he stood in front of it.

questions.text: Hermione believes Harry when he tells her that he saw Lord Voldemort coming back in Book 4.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Of course she does. Besides being cute, beautiful, clever, and intelligent, she is also loyal to her friends, and Harry just happens to be one of them. She trusts him immediately and doesn't see him as a liar.

questions.text: Why do Ron and Hermione fight in the 3rd year?
questions.correct: because Ron thinks that Crookshanks has eaten Scabbers
options: because Ron thinks that Hermione dates McLaggen
questions.explanation:
because Ron thinks that Crookshanks has eaten Scabbers.

	Hermione's cat Crookshanks appears to have eaten Scabbers. It's not true, however. Scabbers, who is really Peter Pettigrew in disguise, fakes his death again. Lily and James Potters' deaths are direct results of Peter Pettigrew's stupidity. He betrayed them and sent Voldemort after them. He also sent Sirius to prison.

questions.text: What does Hermione first think of Krum in year 4?
questions.explanation:
he looks grumpy.

	Hermione first says that he looks grumpy in the Quidditch World Cup when she, Harry, and Ron all visit the Bulgarian tents. Over there, she sees the picture of Krum for the first time, and she says that he looks very grumpy. When he catches the snitch however, she says that he is brave.

questions.text: What is the password that Hermione gives Harry and Ron at the beginning of year 2?
questions.explanation:
wattlebird.

	She tells them that when they are entering the Gryffindor common room, and she seems upset with the fact that they flew to Hogwarts in a flying car.

questions.text: Hermione kisses Harry on the cheek in the third year.
questions.explanation:
False.

	In the fourth year, however, she does kiss him. It is clearly stated on the last page that it was something she had never done before.

questions.text: Cormac McLaggen takes Hermione to the party in Book 6. Who else does she consider asking?
questions.explanation:
Zacharias Smith.

	When she says this to Harry, he is revolted, and he is surprised at how low Hermione would sink, just to get revenge.I really hope that you enjoyed my quiz.I LOVE THIS GIRLPlease rate it highly
